metaTags.metaTitle: Forrester Thought Leadership Paper | Regaining Control With A Connectivity Cloud
metaTags.metaDescription: In August 2023, Cloudflare commissioned Forrester Consulting to evaluate the growing complexity of IT and security operations. In a survey to global IT and security decision makers, the research firm found that their responsibilities have significantly increased and grown in complexity over the last three years. The additional complexity has caused organizations to lose control over their digital environments, resulting in consequential impacts to the business.

relatedBlades.title: Forrester research: Regaining control with a connectivity cloud
relatedBlades.subtitle: How a new type of cloud can tame IT and security complexity
relatedBlades.copy:
![forrester-graphic-cloud-connectivity](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/3v7usiLQYE56HIVJ8jyPbZ/976a246e0df2c3d8e3da3c9f182258b6/Forresterstats.png)

In August 2023, Cloudflare commissioned Forrester Consulting to evaluate the growing complexity of IT and security operations. 

In a survey to global IT and security decision makers, the research firm found that their responsibilities have significantly increased and grown in complexity over the last three years. 

The additional complexity has caused organizations to lose control over their digital environments, resulting in consequential impacts to the business. 

Download this Forrester Consulting thought leadership paper.
